title: Technologies
description: A list of technologies, including their costs, prerequisites, and effects.

columnNumber.title: Column Number
columnNumber.description: Horizontal placement in the Tech Tree. 0 is the leftmost column.

era.title: Era
era.description: Determines era reached after researching any technologies in this column. Must be in Eras.json.

techCost.title: Tech Cost
techCost.description: Default science cost for techs in this column.

buildingCost.title: Building Cost
buildingCost.description: Default cost of buildings requiring this tech.

wonderCost.title: Wonder Cost
wonderCost.description: Default cost of wonders requiring this tech.

techs.title: Techs
techs.description: List of techs in this column.

row.title: Row
row.description: Vertical placement in the Tech Tree, must be unique per column. 1 is the topmost tech.

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: Science cost of this tech. Overrides the column techCost.

uniques.description: List of unique abilities this technology grants.

items.title: Prerequisite
items.description: A Technology that is required to be researched prior.

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
prerequisites.description: Names of technologies that must be researched before this tech can be researched. Only direct prerequisites are necessary.

quote.title: Quote
quote.description: Text that is presented to the player when they research this technology.
